task_summary: PR2 localizes the fridge handle, approaches, grasps, pulls to open the hinged door, verifies it is open, retreats, and releases.

task_long_description.overview: The scene shows a PR2 robot opening a small white fridge next to a drawer cabinet. The contact sheet depicts perception of the closed door, approach to the handle, alignment, grasp, and a pull that swings the hinged door open, revealing the interior shelves. The behavior prioritizes reliable perception, gentle but firm grasping, and a smooth pull while keeping the base and arm clear of the door swing. After confirming the door is open, the robot retreats to a safe distance and releases the handle.
preconditions: Fridge is reachable by the PR2 arm
No obstructing objects in the door swing path
stepwise_plan: Open gripper and search for the fridge handle.
Detect and move to the handle pose.
Align the gripper with low positional tolerance.
Close gripper to secure a stable grasp.
Orient wrist to pull and open the hinged door.
success_criteria: Door angle visibly increased; interior visible
Robot ends clear of the door and handle
failure_and_recovery: Handle not visible: scan pattern and retry detection
Grasp slip: re-close gripper with allowed force and re-pull
Door jam: pause and retry open sequence after small retreat
task_long_description.termination: Terminate after ContainerOpen(fridge) is true and the robot has retreated and released the handle.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Prepare wide grasp aperture before approaching the handle.
Check if the handle is already visible.
Active scan to find the handle if not visible.
Run perception to localize the handle precisely.
Cartesian move to the handle pose.
Grip the handle with medium force.
Rotate wrist to a pulling-friendly orientation.
Pull to open the fridge door.
Back off to a safe distance from the open door.

failure_modes: Door opens opposite to expected hinge side
recovery_strategy: Retry CloseGripper within allowed force bins
Abort and re-approach from safer angle
assumptions: The fridge door is a right-hinged door opening toward the robot, consistent with frames.
Handle type treated generically as 'fridge_handle'; exact geometry not specified.

expected_success_criteria: Interior visible and arm safely retracted
